author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Get rid of after_reply from thrift_processor
We are always flushing the response after we write it.

author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Don't catch exits in thrift_processor
They are not handled properly, so the exit backtrace gets lost.
Just ignore them and let them kill the process naturally.

author: dreiss
msg: At this point, everything passes dialyzer except for the processor,

author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Refactor the read path of the protocol

author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Refactor the read path of the client
